snippet: The Celtics put together their best performance of the series in dominating the middle two quarters, building a 24-point lead and then hanging on for dear life through Miami’s late rally.
abstract: Boston Celtics defeat Miami Heat, 101-91, in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference finals to lead series, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: The Celtics put together their best performance of the series in dominating the middle two quarters, building a 24-point lead and then hanging on for dear life through Miami’s late rally.

headline.seo: Celtics Jump Out to Big Early Lead and Beat Heat
headline.main: Celtics Jump Out to Big Early Lead, and This Time They Don’t Let Up
headline.print_headline: Celtics Seize Control Early, and This Time They Manage to Hold On
headline.content_kicker: Eastern Conference Finals Game 3: Celtics 101, Heat 91
